mapper.insert: insert into trade_cal (id, exchange, cal_date, is_open, pretrade_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pretradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, exchange, cal_date, is_open, pretrade_date from trade_cal
select id, exchange, cal_date, is_open, pretrade_date from trade_cal where is_open = 1 order by cal_date asc
